column5: Upstairs studio with private balcony. Bright and airy space! Newly constructed detached space above the garage gives you lots of privacy from the residence. Located just North of Hyde Park & UT Campus. Large room with seating area, queen bed, office nook, full bath with soaking tub, coffee maker, mini-fridge, microwave, cable TV & WIFI. Walking distance from neighborhood bars, restaurants, the bus line & North Loop shopping district. 5 miles from downtown & 13 miles from Austin Airport.
